import Mathlib

/-!
Let z : ℂ. Show that |cos z| ≥ |cos (Re z)|.
-/

theorem complex_abs_cos_ge_abs_cos_re (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (Complex.cos z) ≥ Real.abs (Real.cos z.re) := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Let z : ℂ. Show that |cos z| ≥ |cos (Re z)|.
-/

theorem complex_abs_cos_ge_abs_cos_re (z : ℂ) : (Complex.cos z).abs ≥ abs (Real.cos z.re) := by sorry
